评论概述: Top was great but bottoms too big!
评论详情: Th top Was perfect size we bought. A small and the pants were definitely at least an XL or XXL. The were too big for my daughter that is 22, 4’11” tall, the pats were way too long and way too big! I am 5’3” abut 200lbs and the were crazy long on me and a bit big. I normally wear an XL or XXl and they were a smidge big on me! We weren’t even sure how to adjust the sizing since it is a 2 pc set .. so since my daughter liked the top and I liked the bottom we decided to keep them she keep the top and I’ll wear the bottoms but I cut the excess material off for appropriate length and it worked out. We figured it could just be a mistake by the seller not sure but it ended up being a win win in the end. If they come mismatched in sizes that could definitely be a problem for others. And we did buy it as a set together, disappointed she couldn’t wear both but we adjusted! Giving 3 stars because it is comfortable to wear and keeps you warm but don’t wanna rate higher because of the mismatched sizing! Good luck! If I had known I wouldn't have ordered it!

评论概述: Really cute but not worth the current price
评论详情: Love this set! A few tips though:  I’m usually a size medium but after reading the reviews I sized down to a small and it fits perfectly. Really glad I listened to everyone’s advice. I’m 5’6.5” and 145lbs for reference.  It’s very soft and comfortable but I can see the material degrading after a few washes. I recommend washing this set on delicate setting.  I have a bit of a gripe with the cost. Def would get more colors if the pricing was reasonable. In September this set was $30, but now it is $75 “discounted” to $53. If they were selling at the original price I would honestly buy every color! I will be waiting until the holiday hype dies down for it to go back to its original price though. The quality of the material is not worth the current price. Still a cute comfy set though!

So I have 3 colors of this set because I am OBSESSED with the jackets.  They fit perfectly, cropped to the middle of my waist and has long sleeves, so the jackets imo are very flattering to any shape. NOW the bottoms... :(  they are very unique looking, I just with the buckle was functional because I cannot get any of the three pairs of bottoms to stay up for the life of me.  They fit perfectly for about 5 minutes, but the fabric does not hold its shape and stretches the second I sit down or move the wrong way.  Maybe this would better fit a curvy body.  I am 5'3 and 140lbs and the bottoms float right at my ankles, so sort of a cross between high water and goucho? but with the design, I guess it works.  If I wear a fabric/elastic belt I don't mind wearing the bottoms to lounge around the house. but I rate this set highly because the jacket itself is worth it and the material is so soft and comfy to wear.

评论概述: Pants will need to be altered
评论详情: The color is a very bright, true red but nonetheless cute for the up-and-coming holiday season. I know this is a dupe for Frankie‘s bikinis $300 set but still had to make alterations. I got it on the sale price for $50  not the original listed price of $72 from the seller. The other reviews are right when they say that the pants bulge at the crotch so I had took my pants to the tailor for alterations and spent $30 to have them create another seam and take them in so they’re not baggy and stop that bulging- you could do the same. The top fits well for what it is but it’s weird how the top fits tight in the pants are loose. I might purchase again because they are very warm in the color is vibrant, but upset that I had to spend extra money because of bulging crotch issue. If you’re willing to spend around $80-$100(alterations included) for this set compared to the Frankies bikinis $300 set I’d say go for it.

评论概述: Comfy and perfect for the cold weather
评论详情: I recently purchased a delightful two-piece knitted set for the winter, and I must say, it is both cute and incredibly comfortable. The set consists of a top and bottoms, and overall, I am quite pleased with my purchase.  Let's start with the top. It fits me perfectly, hugging my body in all the right places. The knitted material feels soft against my skin, providing a cozy and warm sensation. The design is stylish, with a flattering neckline and well-fitted sleeves. I love how it effortlessly adds a touch of charm to my winter outfits.  Moving on to the bottoms, they have a slightly loose fitting, which I find quite comfortable. The relaxed fit allows for ease of movement and doesn't constrict my legs. Despite being a bit looser, the bottoms still manage to maintain a flattering shape, which is a pleasant surprise. The knitted fabric is just as cozy as the top, ensuring that I stay warm throughout the chilly winter days.  Together, the two pieces create a lovely coordinated look that is perfect for the winter season. The cute and comfy nature of this knitted set makes it an ideal choice for lounging at home or going out for a casual outing. It's versatile enough to be dressed up or down, depending on the occasion.  I have received numerous compliments whenever I wear this knitted set. Friends and family have commented on how adorable it looks while still being practical for the winter weather. It has quickly become one of my favorite go-to outfits for the season.  If you're in search of a cute and comfy winter ensemble, I highly recommend this two-piece knitted set. While the top fits perfectly, the slightly loose fitting of the bottoms still manages to remain flattering. It's the ideal combination of style and comfort, making it a must-have addition to your winter wardrobe.
I forget the body doesn't come with the set lol but other than that it's cute. The pants are a bit big but the top fits great so I would hope they shrink in the dryer.

The first thing I immediately noticed when I received the package was the thickness of the material. I first wore it on a cool day and had to change out of it because I was too hot. I tried to wear it again on a much colder day and it kept me warm, I didn't even need to wear layers. The legs and arms are fit and snug. My only complaint is the waist. It has a belt-like addition on the waist but it isn't functional. I am on the slimmer side, and the waist was too baggy. It was especially uncomfortable because the sweater is cropped so the entire waistline is visible and without reinforcements, it just looked sloppy and thrown together. But otherwise, a great piece for those cold winter months.

评论概述: Cute fall set but BEWARE OF SIZING
评论详情: I did find this through tik tok and thought it was a cute out and dupe for the real Frankie’s set. When buying it I was skeptical about sizing. I’m 5’5, 185 lbs and I was going to get a XL at first but after reading reviews and videos I decided to go with a medium and I’m glad I did. The outfit is stretchy so it’s very forgiving with the sizing. However the bottoms are big in comparison with the top. I found it to be loose on my waist and having to pull them up every so often. And for me to be a typical size 8-10, I can’t imagine this outfit being able to fit someone that is on the thinner side, even with a size small. Which is unfortunate. However I will be repurchasing this outfit in more colors and I will probably size down to a small so that the pants fit a little better. But also I did order this outfit two weeks ago at $30 and now it is $46??? So I don’t understand the price jump especially considering that the sizing is definitely inaccurate and in my opinion not really petite girl friendly. But otherwise it is very cute and comfortable outfit if it fits you.

Very pretty color and super soft material. I ordered a large and the top is perfect for my 40D bust but the pants are big. So might be difficult if your measurements Are wonky like me. Otherwise I paired it with a belt and loved it!

评论概述: super cute and nice quality but the sizing for the bottoms is off
评论详情: this is an absolutely adorable set. the knit material itself is good quality and a medium thickness (to gauge for temperatures/seasons i personally could wear it in comfortably: summer at night (currently a 60-70 degrees avg), in the fall and it could be used as a top or bottom layer in winter. I like how it can be super casual for ie lounging and can also be dressed up enough for a casual meal or a nice walk and coffee date. I really do love it but I wish the bottoms fit better. I feel the bottoms are a little loose for a size small and the buckle on the waistband of the pants it’s just for decorations doesn’t actually work. the pants weren’t falling off of me and stayed on my waist and are very comfortable and cozy.  The knit is really soft to. overall I think there a good deal for the price especially considering they’re of good quality and are comfortable. that being said if you do run larger on top than on bottom, the bottoms may not fit you. as the top for the set that was a small in my opinion fit more of a xs/s than s type of fit it is somewhat stretchy but just something to be noted. other than the the sizing being a little off, I don’t think it takes away significantly from how stylish comfy and cute this is and it’s more something to bare in mind with sizing as everyone has different proportions.

I absolutely love it. The only problem is that the bottoms are too big. I’m 5’9” 153 lbs. I bought a medium. The top fits great so I didn’t want to return it to get the small in order for the bottoms to fit. So I’ll just make due with the pants being a little baggy.

I was pleasantly surprised at how much I really like this cute little 2 piece knit outfit.  It's very stylish!  The color was just as pictured, the material is very nice (nice weight, feel and thickness), and it fit as expected.  I'm looking forward to wearing this cute little outfit during the fall. This is so cute that I would order in other colors as well.

This is a really cute set and the material is soft. It's thick but doesn't get too hot. The length is great, if you prefer longer pants. Easy to pair up with any shirt under the jacket top. My only complaint is that it's really heavy. It appeared to fit well so I left for the day and within a couple minutes of walking the pants were sliding down and falling off which only got worse. I got tired of holding them up so pinned it on the front and back to scrunch the waste and make them smaller. That worked for a minute then I had to pin both sides in and fold them over which you could tell I'd done. So before I wear them again I'll have to alter them and bring in the waist a few inches and hopefully that'll do the trick. It's definitely the weight of them that does it but they are really cute and comfy. I'm thinking that ordering a size down wouldn't fit as well plus they'd probably have the same problem anyway- it's like they stretch but not in a normal way.

The title says it all. I was extremely disappointed about how big the pants were because I was SO excited for this too come. Only reason there's one star us because the material is soft.
This is really cute. It’s very thick may be very good material. However, the fit is off the top fits good, but the pants are too short.
